name: HARIOM .
position: Asst. Marketing Manager | SEO Strategist | Growth Marketing | Organic Marketing |
about: As an experienced SEO and organic growth strategist with over 6 years of experience, I specialize in driving visibility, engagement, and measurable growth through data-driven strategies. My expertise spans diverse sectors, including SaaS, finance, e-commerce, and design, where I‚Äôve successfully implemented innovative SEO practices, social media marketing, and content-driven campaigns. From ideation to execution, I excel in managing end-to-end projects, blending technical expertise with a creative approach. Whether it's optimizing platforms for On-page SEO, Off-page SEO, Technical SEO, organic growth or strategizing impactful marketing campaigns, my focus remains on delivering tangible business results. I‚Äôve had the privilege of working with notable brands like Designhill, Jashn Foods, Sahibandhu, and Purever, consistently achieving exceptional outcomes and surpassing objectives. I thrive in dynamic environments and enjoy collaborating with teams to unlock new opportunities in the ever-evolving digital landscape. I am passionate about leveraging AI, cutting-edge tools, and product strategies to drive the growth of SaaS and PaaS businesses. My expertise lies in blending data-driven insights with innovative strategies to create impactful solutions that deliver measurable results. With a deep understanding of AI-driven tools and platforms, I excel in identifying growth opportunities, optimizing workflows, and enhancing user experiences. My proficiency in tools like Figma, FigJam, Trello, Miro, and Adobe Creative Suite enables me to craft intuitive designs and prototypes that resonate with the target audience. Additionally, my experience in SEO, SMM, UI/UX Optimization, and performance marketing ensures a holistic approach to product growth.

posts.title: üöÄ B2B vs. B2C SEO: The Game-Changing‚Ä¶

positions.subtitle: Manipal Fintech
positions.description: At Manipal Fintech, I lead the Marketing team, focusing on SEO, social media marketing (SMM), and performance marketing. My role encompasses devising and implementing strategies to drive visibility, engagement, and traffic across digital channels. I also oversee content optimization and marketing, ensuring our messaging aligns with audience needs and business goals.One of my key contributions has been spearheading the Fincome Gold Loan Advisor project. From ideation to execution, I played a pivotal role in bootstrapping this initiative, including:Designing intuitive user experiences and interfaces.Developing and optimizing content to resonate with the target audience.Collaborating with cross-functional teams on development, QA, and QC to ensure the platform's success.This hands-on involvement has allowed me to deliver a project that aligns with SahiBandhu's vision of expanding its offerings while maintaining exceptional quality standards.My experience here reflects my ability to lead teams, execute multifaceted projects, and drive growth in a competitive market.
positions.title: Search Engine Optimization Team Lead
positions.description_html:
At Manipal Fintech, I lead the Marketing team, focusing on SEO, social media marketing (SMM), and performance marketing. My role encompasses devising and implementing strategies to drive visibility, engagement, and traffic across digital channels. I also oversee content optimization and marketing, ensuring our messaging aligns with audience needs and business goals.

One of my key contributions has been spearheading the Fincome Gold Loan Advisor project. From ideation to execution, I played a pivotal role in bootstrapping this initiative, including:

Designing intuitive user experiences and interfaces.

Developing and optimizing content to resonate with the target audience.

Collaborating with cross-functional teams on development, QA, and QC to ensure the platform's success.


This hands-on involvement has allowed me to deliver a project that aligns with SahiBandhu's vision of expanding its offerings while maintaining exceptional quality standards.

My experience here reflects my ability to lead teams, execute multifaceted projects, and drive growth in a competitive market.

experience.title: Sr. SEO & DM
experience.description: At Purever, I contributed to enhancing the brand's digital presence and driving growth across online platforms. My role involved strategizing and executing campaigns focused on SEO, content marketing, and performance optimization to elevate Purever's positioning as a leader in stainless steel solutions.Key responsibilities and achievements include:Implemented advanced SEO strategies that boosted organic traffic and improved search rankings for core product categories like stainless steel water tanks and pipes.Developed and optimized content across digital channels, aligning with the brand‚Äôs mission of sustainability, durability, and hygiene.Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure cohesive messaging and a consistent digital experience for the target audience.Utilized analytics and performance tools to track campaign effectiveness and refine strategies for maximum ROI.My experience at Purever allowed me to blend technical expertise with creative thinking, driving impactful results and contributing to the company‚Äôs growth in a competitive market.
experience.description_html:
At Purever, I contributed to enhancing the brand's digital presence and driving growth across online platforms. My role involved strategizing and executing campaigns focused on SEO, content marketing, and performance optimization to elevate Purever's positioning as a leader in stainless steel solutions.

Key responsibilities and achievements include:

Implemented advanced SEO strategies that boosted organic traffic and improved search rankings for core product categories like stainless steel water tanks and pipes.

Developed and optimized content across digital channels, aligning with the brand’s mission of sustainability, durability, and hygiene.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure cohesive messaging and a consistent digital experience for the target audience.

Utilized analytics and performance tools to track campaign effectiveness and refine strategies for maximum ROI.


My experience at Purever allowed me to blend technical expertise with creative thinking, driving impactful results and contributing to the company’s growth in a competitive market.

experience.title: Search Engine Optimization Specialist
experience.description: At Jashn Foods, I played a key role in enhancing the digital footprint and driving online visibility for the brand. My efforts were focused on implementing innovative marketing strategies to showcase Jashn Foods' premium-quality products, such as basmati rice, to a wider audience across domestic and international markets.Key responsibilities and achievements include:SEO Optimization: Developed and executed SEO strategies that improved the website's organic search rankings and significantly increased traffic, contributing to brand visibility.Content Strategy: Created and optimized high-quality content tailored to the target audience, highlighting the unique qualities and heritage of Jashn Foods' products.Digital Campaigns: Managed and executed digital marketing campaigns that drove engagement and conversions, resulting in measurable growth for the brand.Brand Positioning: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to strengthen the brand's online presence and align digital efforts with overall business goals.This experience allowed me to blend data-driven insights with creative strategies to help Jashn Foods establish itself as a trusted name in the premium food product segment.
experience.description_html:
At Jashn Foods, I played a key role in enhancing the digital footprint and driving online visibility for the brand. My efforts were focused on implementing innovative marketing strategies to showcase Jashn Foods' premium-quality products, such as basmati rice, to a wider audience across domestic and international markets.

Key responsibilities and achievements include:

SEO Optimization: Developed and executed SEO strategies that improved the website's organic search rankings and significantly increased traffic, contributing to brand visibility.

Content Strategy: Created and optimized high-quality content tailored to the target audience, highlighting the unique qualities and heritage of Jashn Foods' products.

Digital Campaigns: Managed and executed digital marketing campaigns that drove engagement and conversions, resulting in measurable growth for the brand.

Brand Positioning: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to strengthen the brand's online presence and align digital efforts with overall business goals.


This experience allowed me to blend data-driven insights with creative strategies to help Jashn Foods establish itself as a trusted name in the premium food product segment.

experience.title: Search Engine Optimization Specialist
experience.description: At Designhill, I played a key role in driving the growth and visibility of two major offerings: the Custom Logo Design service and the AI Logo Maker Tool. My work primarily targeted the USA and Tier 1 countries, where I focused on optimizing the platform‚Äôs organic search presence and driving qualified traffic to increase conversions.Key responsibilities and achievements include:Parasite SEO Optimization: Implemented advanced strategies to leverage high-authority platforms and improve search rankings for Designhill‚Äôs custom logo design and AI logo maker tools.SEO Audits & Optimization: Conducted thorough SEO audits and performed on-page and off-page optimizations, including keyword research, link building, and content marketing, leading to enhanced organic traffic and improved visibility.B2B & B2C SEO: Developed and executed tailored SEO strategies for both B2B and B2C segments, optimizing user journeys and enhancing conversion rates.Content Marketing & CMS Management: Managed content optimization and streamlined content creation workflows to align with SEO best practices.Web Analytics & Landing Page Optimization: Utilized tools like Google Analytics, Ahrefs, Google Webmaster Tools, and SEM to analyze performance and optimize landing pages for improved user engagement and conversions.Social Media & Reputation Management: Strengthened online reputation through proactive social media optimization (SMO) and off-page SEO strategies.Growth Strategies & Link Building: Designed and implemented growth strategies, including link-building and content-driven campaigns, to support organic search growth and brand awareness.My role at Designhill involved blending SEO, content, and digital marketing expertise to boost Designhill's presence in a competitive space, helping position the platform as a leader in custom logo design and AI-powered tools.
experience.description_html:
At Designhill, I played a key role in driving the growth and visibility of two major offerings: the Custom Logo Design service and the AI Logo Maker Tool. My work primarily targeted the USA and Tier 1 countries, where I focused on optimizing the platform’s organic search presence and driving qualified traffic to increase conversions.

Key responsibilities and achievements include:

Parasite SEO Optimization: Implemented advanced strategies to leverage high-authority platforms and improve search rankings for Designhill’s custom logo design and AI logo maker tools.

SEO Audits & Optimization: Conducted thorough SEO audits and performed on-page and off-page optimizations, including keyword research, link building, and content marketing, leading to enhanced organic traffic and improved visibility.

B2B & B2C SEO: Developed and executed tailored SEO strategies for both B2B and B2C segments, optimizing user journeys and enhancing conversion rates.

Content Marketing & CMS Management: Managed content optimization and streamlined content creation workflows to align with SEO best practices.

Web Analytics & Landing Page Optimization: Utilized tools like Google Analytics, Ahrefs, Google Webmaster Tools, and SEM to analyze performance and optimize landing pages for improved user engagement and conversions.

Social Media & Reputation Management: Strengthened online reputation through proactive social media optimization (SMO) and off-page SEO strategies.

Growth Strategies & Link Building: Designed and implemented growth strategies, including link-building and content-driven campaigns, to support organic search growth and brand awareness.


My role at Designhill involved blending SEO, content, and digital marketing expertise to boost Designhill's presence in a competitive space, helping position the platform as a leader in custom logo design and AI-powered tools.

education.description: During my BCA at Mohta PG College, I focused on gaining expertise in SEO, marketing, and branding. I also developed a strong understanding of online consumer behavior and how to implement growth-driven marketing campaigns. This educational background has been instrumental in shaping my career as a digital marketer and SEO specialist‚Ä¶ Show more

During my BCA at Mohta PG College, I focused on gaining expertise in SEO, marketing, and branding. My studies equipped me with a solid foundation in digital marketing strategies, search engine optimization techniques, and brand development principles. I also developed a strong understanding of online consumer behavior and how to implement growth-driven marketing campaigns.

This educational background has been instrumental in shaping my career as a digital marketer and SEO specialist…

name: Salman Ahmed
position: Manager at Manipal Fintech Pvt. Ltd. (The Manipal Group) |Driving Sales & Strategy | Tele Sales | Fintech | InsureTech | Customer Support | BFSI |Financial Planning |Mutual Funds |
about: A seasoned professional with over 8 years of experience in the BFSI (Banking, Financial Services, and Insurance) sector, specializing in fintech & Insure-tech. Strong understanding of banking and financial services products, agent channel,digital payments, Adept at leveraging technology to enhance sales processes, optimise client engagement, and achieve sales targets. With a proven track record of delivering growth, optimizing portfolios, and enhancing client relationships, I have built a reputation for driving results in dynamic and competitive markets. My expertise spans Sales Strategy, Process Optimisation, Financial Planning, Agent Channel Management, Customer Support, and Team Mentoring.

positions.title: Assistant Manager
positions.description_html:
1. Sales Development - Increased the sales number by 2X by implementing new
strategies and enhanced training of the sales team.

2. Revenue Growth - Delivered 110% annual sales targets, generating decent
increase in revenue.

3. Leadership- Handling the team of 30 people, boosting their performance by 20%
through enhanced training initiatives and structured development programs.

4. Alliance Collabs- Introducing new financial partners to work with and cover the
untouched areas, improved the conversion rate by 5%

5. Customer Relationship Management- Addressing queries of the customer and
developing a long-term solution, which reduced the queries by 25% (FCR rate - 98%).

6. Data Management & Reporting - Maintaining accurate records in CRM or
database systems, Track interactions, feedback, and resolutions for future
reference, sharing regular reports and insights with the relevant stakeholders

positions.subtitle: SahiBandhu
positions.description: Team Performance:Setting and achieving team goals, ensuring productivity, quality, and efficiency.Leadership and Management:Providing guidance, motivation, and mentorship to team members, resolving conflicts, and fostering a positive work environment.Decision Making:Making informed decisions for the team, setting priorities, and managing resources effectively.Training and Development:Identifying training needs, providing skill development opportunities, and nurturing talent within the team.Problem Solving:Addressing challenges, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring smooth workflow within the team.
positions.title: Inside Sales Team Lead
positions.description_html:
Team Performance:
Setting and achieving team goals, ensuring productivity, quality, and efficiency.

Leadership and Management:
Providing guidance, motivation, and mentorship to team members, resolving conflicts, and fostering a positive work environment.

Decision Making:
Making informed decisions for the team, setting priorities, and managing resources effectively.

Training and Development:
Identifying training needs, providing skill development opportunities, and nurturing talent within the team.

Problem Solving:
Addressing challenges, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring smooth workflow within the team.

positions.subtitle: Turtlemint
positions.description: Mutual Fund (Team Leader)Training & development of business partner‚Äôs to sell Mutual funds through the application.Setting up the sales target for the team.Guiding team with Sales skills and attending prospect calls to close the deal.Sharing feedback to the tech team to develop the client & partner-friendly platform to grow with us.Identified issues, analyzed information, and provided solutions to problems.Served customers in a friendly, efficient manner following outlined steps of service.Deal with partners and their clients for various products like Mutual Funds, loans, and General Insurance.Loan (Advisor & Team Leader)Sourcing partner‚Äôs to sell loans and MF using the online portal (mintpro).Communicated acceptance or rejection to applicants via mail, email, telephone consultations.Used critical thinking to break down problems, evaluate solutions and make decisions.Resolved problems, improved operations, and provided exceptional service.Developed team communications and information for meetings.Created customer support strategy for a team of 4 to increase customer support & service level for the process.
positions.title: Team Leader
positions.description_html:
Mutual Fund (Team Leader)

Training & development of business partner’s to sell Mutual funds through the application.
Setting up the sales target for the team.
Guiding team with Sales skills and attending prospect calls to close the deal.
Sharing feedback to the tech team to develop the client & partner-friendly platform to grow with us.
Identified issues, analyzed information, and provided solutions to problems.
Served customers in a friendly, efficient manner following outlined steps of service.
Deal with partners and their clients for various products like Mutual Funds, loans, and General Insurance.

Loan (Advisor & Team Leader)

Sourcing partner’s to sell loans and MF using the online portal (mintpro).
Communicated acceptance or rejection to applicants via mail, email, telephone consultations.
Used critical thinking to break down problems, evaluate solutions and make decisions.
Resolved problems, improved operations, and provided exceptional service.
Developed team communications and information for meetings.
Created customer support strategy for a team of 4 to increase customer support & service level for the process.

positions.subtitle: Turtlemint
positions.description: Job Role and Responsibility:Recruiting of Partners who have strong market connect regards General Insurance, Loans & Mutual Funds.Manage the complete life cycle of the POS e.g. Training the partners on our app for servicing their customers in the most efficient and effective manner, driving partners for higher wallet share with us. Focus on Renewals and ensuring is not dilutedEnsuring to be key contributor in the P&L of the region/location. Ensuring top-line achievementUnderstand and align with the company policies.Maintaining the highest level of business hygiene.Having expertise in Motor Insurance & Health Insurance.Improving partners skills as Financial Adviser while giving them proper training & Webinars.
positions.title: Unit Manager
positions.description_html:
Job Role and Responsibility:
Recruiting of Partners who have strong market connect regards General Insurance, Loans & Mutual Funds.
Manage the complete life cycle of the POS e.g. Training the partners on our app for servicing their customers in the most efficient and effective manner, driving partners for higher wallet share with us.
Focus on Renewals and ensuring is not diluted
Ensuring to be key contributor in the P&L of the region/location. Ensuring top-line achievement
Understand and align with the company policies.
Maintaining the highest level of business hygiene.
Having expertise in Motor Insurance & Health Insurance.
Improving partners skills as Financial Adviser while giving them proper training & Webinars.
